attributes.action: Cancel the BBC licence fee, make them advertise instead
attributes.additional_details: It has become outdated and way too expensive and not worth the fee, which is compulsory.  It should be adverts that fund it now.
attributes.background: The BBC licence is too expensive and outdated.  They are penalising the over 75s.  Make the BBC advertise.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331189
